participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative, introspective, and passionate about art and music.
participant_1.background: My daily routine consists of working from home as a digital artist and spending weekends with my girlfriend in Salt Lake City. I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house. I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program. I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk. I helped develop Facebook.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, self-reflective, and eager to improve.
participant_2.background: I'm not sure what my weight is because I don't have a scale, but I'm pretty sure I'm getting bigger. I am weak and selfish, but I want to change. I currently work for IBM in Chicago. I have blue eyes and curly brown hair. My brother used to be in the navy.

content.text: Hello! It's nice to meet you!
Hi! It's nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a digital artist and I work from home. I help develop Facebook!
Oh wow, that's really cool! What's your favorite part of your job?
I love working from home and being able to set my own hours. I also love the creative freedom I have.
That sounds awesome! I wish I could work from home. I currently work for IBM in Chicago. It's not bad, but it's not my dream job.
I'm sorry to hear that. What would you like to be doing instead?
I'm not really sure. I've thought about starting my own business, but I'm not sure what I would do.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a smart and capable person.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out with friends, watch movies, and read. I also like to play video games.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests.
Yeah, I guess I do. What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts, play music, and spend time with my girlfriend.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a concert, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go! They're a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
